name: Flora The Chef
details: This is a personal service review-based project where. The Chef Called Flora works with homemade food, party dishes etc. This website developed by VSC, HTML, React, React router, JavaScript. Designed by Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI. Data stored in MongoDB. Backend deployed with vercel, Frontend deployed with firebase.

name: Flora The Chef
details: Here customer can explore different kind of service in this page. They can book the chef for their desire services. If anybody want to add their personal service, they can add. Any customer can add their personal review for each different service.

name: Flora The Chef
details: Login and register system has also implemented. If anybody want to access the private route, they have to login or register first. Then they can see their own reviews. The login persons also can add their service.

name: Weekly Walking Routine App
details: It's an app by which you can maintain your daily walking routine. You can count your walking time and break time. After complete your daily target, you can see a Congratulation message in a toast. This site has developed by HTMl, React, JavaScript. Designed with Tailwind CSS. Deployed with Netlify.

name: ULearning
details: It's e-learning website where courses has included category wise. Course Details also added. You can download the course details as pdf file. This site has developed by HTML, React, JavaScript. Designed by Tailwind CSS, Deployed with Netlify.

name: ULearning
details: All courses has displayed in this page. You can visit the courses category wise

name: ULearning
details: Every single course details will display in this page. You can download the pdf copy of course details from here.

name: Used Cloth Collection
details: A dynamic website of Used Cloth Collection. Admin can control buyer and seller, seller can add their products for sell, buyer can buy their products. Each buyer, seller and admin has different route with different functionalities. Seller can advertise all available products in the home page. Admin can access all buyer and seller. Admin also can remove any buyer and seller.

name: Used Cloth Collection
details: Buyers can visit this page only by login the account. They also can add their desire products in order lists. MongoDB has used as database. Backend deployed with vercel and fronted deployed in firebase. Login and register system has also included.

name: Used Cloth Collection
details: By providing all necessary information, a seller can add their desire products in order lists. They also can pay bill from the list. This site has designed with Tailwind CSS and daisy UI.

name: Used Cloth Collection
details: Online payment system has included here. Buyer can easily pay their bill from the listed products. Payment has implemented by Stripe. React, JavaScript, HTML, nodeJS, expressJS,VSC has used for developing this project.

name: Daily News
details: It's a newspaper website. Different kind of news included. You can find here news according to category, details news is also available. This website has created with VSC, HTML,React, JavaScript, VSC has used for developing this project.

name: Daily News
details: Different kind of question answers has given in this blog page. This page has designed by Bootstrap. This site has deployed in Netlify.

name: Daily News
details: You can visit the news according to category. Different type of newses category has included. You can visit your desire site according to category. News has displayed in descending order according to view.

name: Select Best Five
details: It's a sports related website. You can select best five players from the all players. Budget calculation included. Responsive for all device.

name: Select Best Five
details: You can select the best five players from the lists. After completing the five players, selection system will automatically disabled and you can see that in a toast. This website has created with VSC, HTML,React, JavaScript, VSC has used for developing this project.

name: Select Best Five
details: Here you can calculate the budget. Just write the amount in the boxes and calculate the result. This site has deployed by netlify.
